name: search_video_list_by_keywords
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool tiktok_download_video.
Tool description: Tiktok Best Spider. Fast. HD Quality. Without Watermark Download. Video Full Detail. Signature X-Argus,X-Ladon,X-Gorgon 
mail: nb429429@gmail.com

API description: Search for videos on TikTok by specified keywords and additional filtering options.

sort_type.description:
Sort by

0 - Relevance
1 - Like count
3 - Date posted

publish_time.description:
Publish time filter

0 - ALL
1 - Past 24 hours
7 - This week
30 - This month
90 - Last 3 months
180 - Last 6 months

cursor.description: Pagination cursor for navigating results. Defaults to '0'.

region.description: ISO region code to filter results by location. Defaults to 'US'.

count.description: Number of results to retrieve. Defaults to '10'.
